definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Chief tally, is there any tallyman on board?
sentences.chinese: 理貨組長，還有理貨員在關一小貼吧船上嗎？

sentences.english: According to Mr. Smith, Mr. Wang is a competent tallyman.
sentences.chinese: 據史密斯先生稱，王先生是個有能力的理貨員。

sentences.english: It's obvious that one sling was missed out by your tallyman .
sentences.chinese: 很明顯有一勾被你們的理貨員漏掉了。

sentences.english: Perishable goods are piling up at the docks because of the strike of tally clerks.
sentences.chinese: 因理貨員罷工，碼頭上易腐爛的貨物堆積如山。

sentences.english: Chief tallyman, is there any tallyman on board?
sentences.chinese: 理貨組長，還有理貨員在船上嗎？

sentences.english: We usually arrange one tallyman for each gang.
sentences.chinese: 我們通常每條路安排一個理貨員。

sentences.english: Please tell the tally clerks to load the cargo strictly according to the given respective figures.
sentences.chinese: 請告訴理貨員嚴格按照給定的各個數字裝貨。

sentences.english: Tallyman, l find some cargo has been damaged, please don't load them into the hold.
sentences.chinese: 理貨員，我發現有些貨物已經損壞，請不要入艙。

sentences.english: Excuse me, are you a tallyman?
